Class SelectableShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • SelectableShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, SceneShape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompoundShape

    public abstract class SelectableShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements SceneShape, java.lang.Cloneable
    A shape that manages its selection state. Modified to include x, y, translate and a new constructor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nicholas Liu (nl2523)
